dcterms:description: The WikiText-2 dataset contains 2M words for training, 220k words for validation, and 250k words for testing, with a vocabulary of 33k words. It is specifically designed to contain many long-term dependencies.
dcterms:title: WikiText-2

dcterms:description: The Wall Street Journal (WSJ) dataset is used for automatic speech recognition tasks and contains 8k words, with a vocabulary of 120k words. It is part of the Kaldi Speech Recognition Toolkit.
dcterms:title: Wall Street Journal (WSJ)
